mapper.insert: insert into sd_logs (logid, mod, czr, czlx, czsj, xxqk) values (#{logid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{czr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{czlx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{czsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{xxqk,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update sd_logs set mod = #{mod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, czr = #{czr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, czlx = #{czlx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, czsj = #{czsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, xxqk = #{xxqk,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where logid = #{logid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select logid, mod, czr, czlx, czsj, xxqk from sd_logs
